trans-unit.source: an array : $aArray[1] contains the real socket, $aArray[2] contains the specified IP address and $aArray[3] contains the port. We need this information in subsequent calls to UDPRecv(), where we pass this socket structure/array.

We need this information in subsequent calls to UDPRecv(), where we pass this socket structure/array.
